text: Maury Waugh (born c. 1940) is an American football coach. He is an assistant coach at Trine University in Angola, Indiana, a position he has held since 2010. Waugh served as the head football coach at the University of Dubuque in Dubuque, Iowa from 1969 to 1974, Simpson College in Indianola, Iowa from 1975 to 1979, and Lake Forest College in Lake Forest, Illinois from 1992 to 1994. ==Head coaching record== ===College football=== ==References== ==External links== * Trine profile Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Drake Bulldogs football coaches Category:Dubuque Spartans baseball coaches Category:Dubuque Spartans football coaches Category:Dubuque Spartans football players Category:Lake Forest Foresters football coaches Category:Northwestern Wildcats football coaches Category:Saint Francis Cougars football coaches Category:Simpson Storm football coaches Category:Toronto Argonauts coaches Category:Trine Thunder football coaches Category:Wayne State Warriors football coaches Category:Western Carolina Catamounts football coaches Category:High school football coaches in Illinois Category:People from Aledo, Illinois
title: Maury Waugh
